name: Ninja Gainyk
detailed_description:
Only the best and fastest ninjas can call themselves the Gainyk ninjas.

In this game, you have to stack your score by cutting the paint balls that are thrown in the air in front of you. The things you want to avoid is the bombs, one wrong cut and all is blown away!

Once your score gets high enough, you pass the certain stage and more onto another, more difficult one. This happens as long as there are more stages and once you have completed them all - you become the Gainyk ninja.

Speed and precision is required to solve all the stages, mistakes are allowed but you should try and keep them at a minimum.
